viewData.name: Phi Scalp Medium 10ml
viewData.short_description: PhiScalp pigments are specially formulated pigments for scalp micropigmentation procedure, effectively simulating extremely natural hair follicles.
viewData.long_description: ┬áThey are characterized with extra high stability, no color migration and no fading to unwanted colors. PhiScalp pigments are dermatologically proven pigments, providing natural results for a long-term satisfaction. The pigments come in light, medium and dark color to suit every skin tone and complexion.
